title: Registered Users Sign On
text: Users that have a Covisint User ID may use this form to Sign On. Access to this system is restricted to authorized users. Individuals accessing or attempting to gain unauthorized access to this system will be prosecuted to the full extent of all applicable laws. By using this system, the user consents to such access, reading, interception, monitoring, recording, copying, audit, inspection and disclosure for any purpose. Users of this system have no explicit or implicit expectation of privacy. If you do not agree to the terms and conditions set forth above, do not Sign On to this system. If you are not an authorized user, do not Sign On to this system.
